donationModal.message: Support us with a donation to help us buy a domain and keep growing!

help.title: Information about the supplies used in production.
help.material: Name of the supply or raw material to be used.
help.price: Unit cost of the supply in the selected currency.
help.netContent: Amount of the supply that constitutes its net content (per unit of measure).
help.usedQuantity: Quantity of the supply used in each production lot.
help.costPerLot: Resulting cost per lot, calculated from the price, net content, and used quantity.

help.title: Enter the fixed costs associated with the plant.
help.description: Description of the expense, e.g. rent or utilities.
help.monthlyCost: Monthly cost assigned to the specified expense.

dailyExpenses.title: Daily Expenses and Operation
dailyExpenses.workDaysPlaceholder: Number of working days in the month (e.g. 30)
dailyExpenses.dailyAvgPlaceholder: Number of units sold per day (e.g. 20)

help.title: Enter the daily operation information and associated costs.
help.workDays: Number of days the plant operates during the period.
help.costPerDay: Daily cost calculated based on plant expenses and working days.
help.dailyAvg: Average number of units produced or sold per day.
help.localCost: Additional cost per unit due to extra local expenses.
help.productionCost: Total production cost excluding extra local cost.
help.totalCost: Sum of production cost and fixed plant expenses.

productInfoForm.producedUnitsPlaceholder: Number of products you will produce

help.currency: Select the currency in which costs and prices will be expressed.
help.producedUnits: Total number of units that will be produced in the selected period.
help.timeFrame: Choose the production period (e.g., week, two weeks, month).
help.gainPercentage: Additional percentage added to the cost to determine the sale price.

help.product: This title shows the product name to identify the report.
help.resultsSummary: Brief summary of the results obtained in the analysis.

help.costElaboration: Cost associated with production, calculated from the cost of supplies.
help.fixedCostTotal: Total fixed cost based on plant expenses during the period.
help.dailyUnitCost: Daily cost per unit, considering fixed cost and number of operating days.
help.performance: Total number of units produced in the selected period.
help.saleUnitCost: Base cost per sale unit, including direct costs and additional expenses.
help.gainPercentage: Additional percentage applied to the cost to determine profit.
help.salePrice: Final sale price per unit, resulting from the unit cost plus profit.
help.gain: Difference between sale price and base cost per unit.

help.title: Detailed information about the fixed plant expenses.
help.description: Description of the expense, e.g., rent, utilities, etc.
help.monthlyCost: Monthly cost assigned to each plant expense item.

help.title: Detailed information about the supplies used in production.
help.material: Name of the supply or raw material.
help.price: Price of the supply in the selected currency.
help.netContent: Amount representing the net content of the supply.
help.unit: Unit of measurement for the supply, e.g., piece, kg, liter.
help.usedQuantity: Quantity of the supply used for production during the period.
help.costPerLot: Resulting cost per lot, calculated from price, net content, and quantity used.
